thread.title: Save £5 when you spend £12 or more on books, cards and stationery
thread.title_full: Save £5 when you spend £12 or more on books, cards and stationery - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save £5 when you spend £12 or more on books, cards and stationery
text: You can save on the whole range, including greeting cards, the Back to School fashion stationery range as well as arts and crafts to keep the children entertained this summer. Plus, you can save on all books, from the latest bestselling novels and great holiday reads to your child's favourite author and non-fiction titles. How to claim To claim, see the newspaper on Saturday, August 8, 2015 telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
